GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
remoteproc: imx_rproc: Fix refcount leak in imx_rproc_addr_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 0dc1663e3fc22c72e1ab33be7701a0d51cca84ef, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 6e962bfe56b99843ab716dc8a9438039476c99e2. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: remoteproc: imx_rproc: Fix refcount leak in imx_rproc_addr_init
